tool_description: Compares recipe nutritional profile against specified dietary goals and restrictions to assess compliance and identify gaps.

calories_per_serving.description: Calories per serving of the recipe

diet_type.description: Specific diet type to check against

error_messages: Invalid nutritional values: All nutritional values must be non-negative numbers.
Invalid targets: All target values must be positive numbers greater than 0.
Unsupported diet type: Use one of [general, low-sodium, high-protein, low-carb, keto, mediterranean].
Unrealistic targets: Target values appear outside normal ranges. Verify target specifications.
usage: Provide per-serving nutritional values and optionally set target_calories, target_protein_g, max_sodium_mg, and diet_type. Returns compliance assessment with recommendations.

overall_compliance.description: Whether recipe meets all specified dietary goals

calorie_status.description: Status of calorie content vs target

protein_status.description: Status of protein content vs target

sodium_status.description: Status of sodium content vs maximum

recommendations.description: List of recommendations to improve compliance
